Class DocumentRevisionController

java.lang.Object
com.dms.controller.DocumentRevisionController
All Implemented Interfaces:

@RestController public class DocumentRevisionController extends Object implements RevisionsApi
Controller handling document /revisions endpoints.

      Returns:

    • getRevisions

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PageWithRevisionsDTO> getRevisions(Integer page, Integer limit, String sort, String filter)
      Description copied from interface: RevisionsApi
      GET /revisions : List revisions Retrieves a list of revisions.
      Specified by:
      getRevisions in interface RevisionsApi
      Parameters:
      page - The page number for pagination. (optional, default to 0)
      limit - The maximum number of items to return per page. (optional, default to 10)
      sort - A comma-separated list of sort keys. Valid keys are 'revision_id', 'name', 'type', 'size', 'version', 'created_at'. Each key can be sorted by either: asc (ascending order) or desc (descending order). Example usage: ?sort=name:desc,type:asc. (optional, default to name:asc)
      filter - A comma-separated list of filter keys. Valid keys are 'name', 'type'. Each key can be filtered using any value wrapped in quotation marks. Filtering works by checking whether the string contains the given substring. Example usage: ?filter=name:\"logo\",type:\"image\" (optional, default to name:\"\")
      Returns:
      Successfully retrieved list of the revisions. (status code 200) or Some of the parameters are missing or not valid. (status code 400) or Either no access token was provided or the provided access token is invalid or expired. (status code 401)
